channel.title: Realm Of Ruins - 317
channel.description:
Realm Of Ruins (317)
realmps.webs.com
Pking fully working -all new hitmarks -all special attacks working -pk armor, overloads, extremes / pkp and pkp shops -pvm 12+ bosses more to come and pvm points -Torva/ Pernix/ Virtus/ Chotics/ Claws/ AGS/ Korasi/ VLS/ Anchor/ SOL/ Ganodermic/ Polypore/ hand-cannon + more -(under construction)dwarf cannon/zaryte bow/god bows -(customs) Wind/leaf blade/sky blue/ lightning whips. death cape. 2x XP ring.
24/7 Uptime with VPS hosting and DDOS protection all paid for 6 months!
Webclient Working!
Penguins for good training and decent drops (dragon weapons for starter cash) NOT OVERPOWERED DROPS TO DESTROY THE ECONOMY!
Double XP weekends! PK events daily! Great rewards for staying on with us and helping us grow!
Drop party at ten players and another at 15 to start off our great eco/pk server!
CANT WAIT TO SEE YOU ON WITH US!
Now for some pictures! :D
[IMG]http://i1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb411/kendal913/website.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb411/kendal913/Screenshot7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb411/kendal913/advertise.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb411/kendal913/corp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb411/kendal913/penguin.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb411/kendal913/clawskbd.jpg[/img]
Join Us!
realmps.webs.com
